member.name: M:WatiN.Core.UnitTests.DialogHandlerTests.PromptDialogHandlerTests.PromptDialogHandler
member.summary: Because of popup blockers this test will almost always fail. To run the test succesfully: 1 - Open the TestEvents.html page in IE. 2 - Click on the Show prompt button 3 - Handle the warning on top of the IE window, select to temporarily allow the scripts to run on this page 4 - Now you can start this unit test (remove Ignore attribute first)
